search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Simplesat (simplesat.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official pricing page for Simplesat: https://www.simplesat.io/pricing .

extracted_content.content:

--------------------------

### Standard

[Get started](https://app.simplesat.io/signup)

### Pro

#### User management

Account users

![Image 24](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Allocate roles like Admin, Manager, Collaborator, and Billing to ensure appropriate access and visibility.

15

30

Usage based

Two-factor authentication

![Image 25](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Enhance login security with 2FA, requiring both password and a second verification form.

User activity logs

![Image 26](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Utilize audit logs to monitor all account activities within the last 30 days, bolstering security and compliance.

Stream activity logs with SIEM

![Image 27](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Directly stream user activity logs to your SIEM system for enhanced security monitoring.

SSO with Google and Microsoft

![Image 28](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Streamline sign-in and account creation with secure Google and Microsoft SSO options.

Enterprise SSO

![Image 29](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Facilitate easy access via your organization's IdP, supporting SAML and OIDC for streamlined authentication.

Directory sync

![Image 30](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Keep user accounts in sync with your organization's IdP for seamless user management in Simplesat.

Custom roles

![Image 31](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Granular control over workspace permissions.

#### Survey functionality

Top satisfaction metrics

![Image 32](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Access CSAT, NPS, CES, and 5-Star metrics, with Simplesat recognized by Bain & Company for NPS surveys.

Question types

![Image 33](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Opt from multiple choice, multi-select, sliders, to comments for engaging questions and quality responses.

Follow-up question logic

![Image 34](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Tailor follow-up questions with conditional logic based on sentiment or rating, for deeper insights.

AI generated questions

![Image 35](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Overcome survey writer’s block with AI-customized question suggestions based on your input.

Multi-language support

![Image 36](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Surveys are available in numerous languages. Need another? Reach out, and we’ll make it happen.

#### Delivery methods

External email embed

![Image 37](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Incorporate one-click surveys into any email signature (Gmail or Outlook), helpdesk, or CRM correspondence, with rating URLs extracting data from placeholders like ticket ID or customer email.

Direct email delivery

![Image 38](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Dispatch email surveys from Simplesat, covering ongoing, one-time, and event-triggered approaches.

Direct link

![Image 39](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Leverage a direct survey link for use anywhere, including generating QR codes for physical spaces!

Web-embed

![Image 40](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Conduct surveys directly on your website or app, featuring smart rules to target the appropriate audience.

#### Notifications

Instant emails

![Image 41](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Tailor your alert preferences to receive updates on any survey feedback, filtering by sentiment or comment inclusion—for nuanced insight into every response.

Summary emails

![Image 42](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Get concise weekly and monthly email digests for each survey, keeping you informed of overall trends and feedback.

Slack & MS Teams

![Image 43](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Receive immediate feedback alerts and in-depth weekly/monthly summaries directly in your preferred communication platform.

#### Reporting

Survey dashboards

![Image 44](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Each survey includes a dashboard for a high-level summary and detailed question analysis.

Pivot table reports

![Image 45](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Craft detailed reports to analyze your data comprehensively, such as tracking CSAT scores or comparing agent performance over time.

Feedback

![Image 46](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Access all responses with filters to swiftly locate specific feedback.

Printable PDF reports

![Image 47](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Generate and download top-quality PDFs for any survey, ideal for internal sharing or client presentations.

Custom dashboards

![Image 48](https://www.simplesat.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/blank-img.png)

Create tailored dashboards by selecting relevant widgets for precise insights, eliminating unnecessary data.

One-off emails

Pricing FAQs
------------

What's the difference between "Account users" and "Support agents" in Simplesat?

**Account users** are individuals with specific roles who log into Simplesat; their numbers are limited by your plan. **Support agents**, (or **team members**), associated with feedback, have no limits, ensuring flexibility in feedback management. [Learn more](https://help.simplesat.io/en/articles/9158557-what-s-the-difference-between-users-and-team-members).

What if my needs exceed the Elite plan?

For requirements beyond the Elite plan, please [reach out to us](https://www.simplesat.io/contact-sales/). We’re eager to tailor an Enterprise solution that fits your specific needs.

How do you ensure security?

At Simplesat, security is paramount. We adhere to [industry best practices](https://help.simplesat.io/en/articles/3477488-how-secure-is-simplesat) across all critical systems and infrastructure, ensuring your data’s integrity.

Are there discounts available?

Absolutely! Opt for an annual subscription and enjoy a month on us. Additionally, 501(c)(3) non-profit organizations receive a 10% discount, and [eligible startups](https://www.simplesat.io/simplesat-for-startups/) benefit from 6 months free.

What about contracts?

Freedom is key; there are no contracts here. You’re free to cancel any time as we strive to continuously earn your trust.

Are trial features limited?

The free trial provides the full suite of Elite plan features, with two exceptions: daily email send limits and Enterprise SSO are not included. If you need extended access or wish to test SSO, please reach out to us.

Can I migrate feedback from another system?

Definitely! Forward us your feedback data in CSV format, and we’ll assist with the migration.

What kind of support do you offer?

Expect nothing less than stellar support. Reach out via live chat or [email at any time](mailto:support@simplesat.io), available for every plan level.

Can I request a 1:1 demo?

We’d love to guide you through Simplesat or assist with onboarding. [Schedule your demo today](https://www.simplesat.io/demo).

Where can I find Simplesat reviews?

Discover our glowing 5-star reviews at [G2 Crowd](https://www.g2.com/products/simplesat/reviews), [Caperra](https://www.capterra.com/p/177336/Simplesat/), and [Zendesk](https://www.zendesk.com/au/marketplace/apps/support/973249/simplesat/?queryID=85b124cdfa795c19be8910ed47d595c3)

Is billing available in local currencies?

For the Standard, Pro, and Elite plans, billing is in USD. Local currency billing can be accommodated for Enterprise customers.

How quickly can I get set up with Simplesat?

Setting up is fast! It takes just a minute to create your free account. From there, another 5-10 minutes to create a survey and embed it in your email signature. So, in short: very quickly!

Can Simplesat integrate with my existing tools?

Absolutely! With over 50 CRMs and helpdesks integrated, chances are we’re compatible with your tools. If not, we’re open to exploring new integrations to meet your needs.

What training resources are available to get started?

New to customer feedback? [Explore our guides](https://www.simplesat.io/guides/). For a self-paced learning experience, dive into a free trial and [follow our documentation](https://help.simplesat.io/en/collections/1928696-getting-started-with-surveys). Our support team is also ready to provide additional help or guidance whenever you need it.

Your Customer Feedback Management Toolbox
-----------------------------------------
